item.title: Weird Deltascape Client?
item.dc:creator: @Word_Life Word Life
item.description:
@Word_Life wrote:

Just replace 127.0.0.1 with your server IP. Leave the http:// part there. I’ve had a client like this before, it will work.

Read full topic

item.title: Weird Deltascape Client?
item.dc:creator: @Exorth1 Exorth
item.description:
@Exorth1 wrote:

This client’s ip can be changed by the client.java

It uses the code below…

[code=java] public final URL getCodeBase()
{
if(signlink.mainapp != null)
return signlink.mainapp.getCodeBase();
try
{
if(super.aFrame_Sub1_15 != null)
return new URL(“http://127.0.0.1:” + (80 + anInt958));
}
catch(Exception _ex) { }
return super.getCodeBase();
}

[/code]

If any of you have the same thing then you must know that even if you change 127.0.0.1 to your server ip the client somehow doesn’t connect to it. Although you might think it’s the server but it’s not. I’ve tried different clients and they work well. So does anyone know how to correct this problem.

-Feras

Read full topic
